title: The Bessemer converter
creator_credit: Merton Park, Film Producers Guild, Frank A. Hoare and John Durst
brief_description: This film describes the structure and operation of the Bessemer Convertor for making steel. Shows the raw materials, explains the chemical reactions which occur in the convertor, and points out the difference between basic and acid convertors.
